abstract: FedEx is trying to drum up frenzy over the FedEx golf playoffs that start at the Westchester Country Club on Thursday.
snippet: FedEx is trying to drum up frenzy over the FedEx golf playoffs that start at the Westchester Country Club on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: IF you are south of Greenwich Street in Manhattan between noon and 5 p.m. today, look for a weird miniparade: A guy carrying a “quiet” sign followed by a golfer, his caddy and an entourage of nattily dressed “fans.”

headline.main: FedEx Hopes for the Right Bounce From Golf
headline.print_headline: FedEx Hopes for the Right Bounce From Golf
